changeSet.author: mdbdba
changeSet.createView: select a.id as party_composition_id, a.party_size, a.popularity_pct, b.id as class_order, b.class, a.gather_date from party_composition as a join party_composition_class as b on a.id = b.party_composition_id

changeSet.author: mdbdba
changeSet.sql: grant insert, update, delete on "party_composition" to app;
grant insert, update, delete on "party_composition_class" to app;
